column6:
BEAUS & EROS ,2006,5
As the case against STARFOX comes to a close, romantic entanglements come to a head. So, will it be heartbreak or happily-ever-after for Pug and She-Hulk? All this and an all-new superhuman law case that asks, "Is a secret identity grounds for divorce?" Pull out the hankies, Gamma-Fans, 'cause this one's got plenty of kisses and kicks to go around.


32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Juan Bobillo | inker:Will Conrad | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | colorist:Dave Kemp | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Dan Slott
